values.title: Human-Centric AI
values.description: We believe AI should empower agents, not eliminate them. Swiftly handles the queue, so your team can handle the customer.

values.title: Speed is Respect
values.description: Making a customer wait 24 hours for a simple answer is disrespectful. We believe instant resolution is the highest form of customer service.

values.title: Trust by Default
values.description: We handle sensitive data. We don't take shortcuts. GDPR compliance and enterprise-grade security are the foundation of our code, not an afterthought.

founders.name: Ilias Teknis
founders.bio: Former Head of Customer Success. Obsessed with building support teams that don't burn out. Believes that the future of service is 50% Tech, 50% Empathy.

founders.name: Ilias Almerekov
founders.bio: AI Engineer with a background in NLP (Natural Language Processing). Previously built automation engines for fintech. Ensuring Swiftly isn't just fast, but safe and precise.
